outputs.output_descr:
The project supports development of  a National Strategy and Action Programme (NSAP) to combat desertification in arid, semi-arid, and dry sub humid regions with a view to meet its priorities and help implement the United Nations Convention to Combat Desertification (UNCCD). The NSAP will be combined with its Integrated Financing Strategy.

The aim of such exercise is to draft a NSAP document that will be a comprehensive and robust strategic document to be used at the policy and programmatic levels for implementing the UNCCD as well as combating land degradation in the Palestinian Authority.

project_descr: The specific objective is to assist the Palestinian Authority  to develop  a National Strategy and Action Programme (NSAP) for combating desertification in oPt
